attributes.name: cachedProperties
attributes.description: Dynamic Object's custom properties in cache

methods.name: getProperty
methods.description: Get the value of a given property. Throws an exception if no property with such name exist.

methods.name: setProperty
methods.description: Set the value of a given property. Will create a new property if no property with such name exist.

methods.name: getPropertyInCache
methods.description: Get the value of a given property from the cache. Throws an exception if no property with such name exists.

methods.name: setPropertyInCache
methods.description: Set the value of a given property in the cache with expire time limit. Will create a new property if no property with such name exists.
methods.parameters: property: String, value: Any, seconds: Long

methods.name: getOrderedPropertyNames
methods.description: Get the insertion-ordered list of property names.

methods.name: getOrderedPropertyNamesInCache
methods.description: Get the inserted-ordered list of property names in cache.

methods.name: getProperty
methods.description: Get the value of a given property. Throws an exception if no property with such name exist.

methods.name: setProperty
methods.description: Set the value of a given property. Will create a new property if no property with such name exist.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Check if the proxied object can be resolved.

methods.name: getOrderedPropertyNames
methods.description: Get the insertion-ordered list of property names.

classes.name: DynamicTypesManager
classes.description: Provides operations for all dynamic objects.

methods.name: getFromCache
methods.description: Get object from cache. This method should not be used in finders, because the cache is limited to the current session and is not shared among nodes

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Get dynamic type given its namesapce and name.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Get a reference to an instance of a given dynamic type.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, id: String

methods.name: removeAll
methods.description: Remove all dynamic namespaces/types/relations.

methods.name: putInCache
methods.description: Put object in cache. This cache is limited to the current session and is not shared among nodes

methods.name: getNamespace
methods.description: Get a dynamic namespace with a given name.

methods.name: invalidate
methods.description: Notify the system that an object has changed.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, id: String

methods.name: makeObject
methods.description: Create new instance of a given dynamic type.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, id: String, name: String, props: String[]

methods.name: getAllTypes
methods.description: Get all defined dynamic types.

methods.name: removeType
methods.description: Remove dynamic type definition.

methods.name: removeNamespace
methods.description: Remove a dynamic namespace. All dynamic types that belong to this namespace are also removed.

methods.name: updateType
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, newNamespace: String, newType: String, newIcon: String, newProperties: String[]

methods.name: exportConfigurationAsPackage
methods.description: Export configuration to package.

methods.name: importConfigurationFromPackage
methods.description: Import configuration from package.

methods.name: defineNamespace
methods.description: Define a new dynamic namespace.

methods.name: bindTypeFinderMethods
methods.description: Assign workflow/action bindings for a type.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, findByIdBinding: String, findAllBinding: String, hasChildrenInRelationBinding: String, findRelationBinding: String

methods.name: defineRelation
methods.parameters: parentType: String, childType: String, relationName: String

methods.name: getAllNamespaces
methods.description: Get all defined dynamic namespaces.

methods.name: generateTypeFinderMethods
methods.description: Generate workflow bindings for a type and return their IDs.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, category: ch.dunes.model.workflow.WorkflowCategory

methods.name: getAllNamespacesByPackage
methods.description: Get all defined dynamic namespaces in the configuration package.

methods.name: defineType
methods.description: Define a new dynamic type within a given namespace.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, icon: String, properties: String[], actions: ch.dunes.model.dunes.ScriptModule[]

methods.name: setTypeCustomProperty
methods.description: Add custom property to dynamic type.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, key: String, value: Any

methods.name: getTypeCustomProperty
methods.description: Get custom property by key.
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, key: String

methods.name: removeTypeCustomProperty
methods.description: Remove dynamic type's custom property by key
methods.parameters: namespace: String, type: String, key: String

methods.name: validateConfigurationPackage
methods.description: Validate configuration package.

methods.name: importTypesFromXSD
methods.description: Generate dynamic type definitions for complex types defined in a XSD schema.
methods.parameters: xsdUri: String, namespace: String, category: ch.dunes.model.workflow.WorkflowCategory

methods.name: removeFromCache
methods.description: Remove object from cache.

methods.name: getCacheKeys
methods.description: Get a list of all keys in cache.
